heading: Unordered List
p: In an unordered list, the order of the items does not matter. It is typically displayed with bullet points.

heading: Ordered List
p: In an ordered list, the order of the items is important. It is typically displayed with numbers or letters.

heading: Description List
p: A description list is used for terms and descriptions. Itâ€™s useful for defining terms or creating glossary-like lists.
